item.title: Animated Loop for 'Sticky Fingers - Dreamland' Music Video
item.description:
Animated Loop for 'Sticky Fingers - Dreamland' Music Video

This is a short loop that I animated for the 'Dreamland' music video for Sticky Fingers. Every frame was hand drawn and coloured using Photoshop. Check out the official video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zgnxZUUtIdg

item.title: About
item.description:
About

About animator and digital artist Elliot Schultz.

item.title: Embroidered Zoetrope
item.description:
Embroidered Zoetrope

This project encourages viewers to watch and engage with animation physically. Discs were created with animated sequences embroidered onto their surface. They have been designed to be played on standard turntables and their shape and size is inherited from 10" vinyl records.
